memberdef.name: helpstr
memberdef.initializer:
= "Description: 
\ Extract acoustic features form from audio file.
\ 
\ The main parameters that affect the final output, with typical values, are:
\ 
\ samprate, typically 8000, 11025, or 16000
\ lowerf, 130, 200, 130, for the respective sampling rates above
\ upperf, 3700, 5200, 6800, for the respective sampling rates above
\ nfilt, 31, 37, 40, for the respective sampling rates above
\ nfft, 256 or 512
\ format, raw or nist or mswav
\ ""

memberdef.name: examplestr
memberdef.initializer:
= "Example: 
\ This example creates a cepstral file named "output.mfc" from an input audio file named "input.raw", which is a raw audio file (no header information), which was originally sampled at 16kHz. 
\ 
\ sphinx_fe -i input.raw 
\ -o output.mfc 
\ -input_endian little 
\ -samprate 16000 
\ -lowerf 130 
\ -upperf 6800 
\ -nfilt 40 
\ -nfft 512"
